name: Sesame Crusted Tuna
recipeIngredient: sesame seed (I haven't listed quantity as it will vary for size of steaks, but enough to cover one side of tuna)
recipeInstructions: 1. Cover one side of tuna completely with sesame seeds and place steaks back in fridge.
2. Combine all the other ingredients in a saucepan heat until blended and sugar has dissolved. Leave on low heat to keep warm.
3. Heat some olive oil in a fry pan, place Tuna sesame seed side down cook for 4 minutes turn over and cook on the other side for a further 4 minutes.
4. Serve tuna on plate with dipping sauce in separate small serving bowls.
